data.actual_result: Discord pops up after rebooting, instead of opening silently in the background.
data.expected_result: Discord should open at login, but hidden, and should remain so until clicked.
data.short_description: On macOS, adding Discord as a login item and checking the "Hide" box doesn't hide Discord upon restart.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open "Users & Groups" - Click "Login Items" - Add Discord - Check "Hide" next to Discord - Reboot - Notice that Discord still pops up during login
